original_text: The man gave them some food to eat in his house. The guard and all his family were very happy because now they believed in God.
korean_text: 그들을 데리고 자기 집에 올라가서 음식을 차려 주고 그와 온 집안이 하나님을 믿으므로 크게 기뻐하니라

sentences.original_text: The man gave them some food
The guard and all his family
because now they believed in God
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그들이 하나님을 믿게 되었기 때문이다
